questions.question: If Scarlet Witch was designing a watershed map, her steps might be...

choices.answer: GO OUTSIDE & LOOK OVER THE AREA
SKETCH BUILDING OUTLINES OR LOTS &  TREES
SHOW ARROWS WHERE WATER FLOWS
CHECK THE KEY SO SHE HAS AT LEAST 9 SYMBOLS
An area where water on a landscape drains into.
A place on a map that has lakes and rivers
A plot of land where rainfall collects and ponds
Is only found in forests, fields & open areas

NO, since movie sets need ponding of water for dramatic effect

questions.question: Luke is frustrated about life on Tatooine because there's no "impervious surface"...

choices.answer: TRUE, it's a desert and hardly ever rains.
FALSE, he's mad Uncle Owen won't let him  add sweet cream to the blue milk
FALSE, sand allows water to filtrate so it's NOT IMPERVIOUS.
TRUE, water doesn't filter through solid things like his little abode there
